personal.name: Aditya Vikram
personal.title: Senior Software Engineer
personal.summary: Dynamic Senior Software Engineer with over 3.5 years of experience in developing innovative software solutions. Proficient in machine learning, predictive maintenance, and embedded systems, excelling at enhancing operational efficiency and safety in automotive technologies.

highlights: Developed machine-learning model to predict Diagnostic Module Tank Leakage (DMTL) pump replacement times, enhancing maintenance strategies
Created Visual Studio Code extension integrated with Copilot to provide real-time MISRA-compliant suggestions, ensuring adherence to coding standards
Developed and optimized Python-based backend APIs using FastAPI and Flask, contributing to cloud deployments on AWS and Azure for scalable environmental footprint calculation tools
Collaborated in cross-functional team to design and implement web applications and value engineering tools, supporting Bosch sustainability goals through innovative software solutions
Implemented cybersecurity and security access with AES-128 algorithm
Applied deep understanding of automotive sensors and actuators (ADC, DIO, PWM, SENT) to optimize embedded systems for real-time applications
Worked with TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, and Scikit-Learn for machine learning implementations

latex_variants.ml_focused: Developed predictive maintenance ML models using TensorFlow and PyTorch, achieving enhanced operational efficiency. Created AI-integrated VS Code extensions and deployed scalable cloud solutions on AWS/Azure.
latex_variants.automotive_focused: Applied deep understanding of automotive sensors (ADC, DIO, PWM, SENT) to optimize embedded systems. Implemented AES-128 security protocols and developed MISRA-compliant code tools for automotive safety standards.
latex_variants.backend_focused: Developed and optimized Python-based backend APIs using FastAPI and Flask. Contributed to cloud deployments on AWS and Azure for scalable environmental footprint calculation tools.
latex_variants.leadership_focused: Collaborated in cross-functional teams to design web applications supporting Bosch sustainability goals. Consistently recognized as Star Performer for exceeding performance metrics across 12 consecutive quarters.

projects.title: Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: Designed a visual tool demonstrating various algorithm performance with adjustable parameters using Python and Flask.

projects.title: Image Steganography
projects.description: Developed secure confidential data transmission by embedding encrypted information within images, combining signal processing and security.

achievements.title: Sustained Top Performance (Star Performer)
achievements.description: Recognized as the 'Star Performer' for every single quarter from Q4 2022 through 2025, consistently exceeding performance metrics and quality standards.
achievements.significance: Top performance recognition across all evaluation periods

achievements.title: Letter of Recommendations
achievements.description: Received recommendations from Lead Engineers from Bosch and Head of Department (HOD) of NSEC

achievements.title: CodeChef 4-Star Rating
achievements.achievement: Achieved an overall rating of 4 star

certifications.name: Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification
